actions.description: The deep scion makes two Battleaxe attacks, or it makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.
actions.name: Battleaxe

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite (Hybrid Form Only)

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw (Hybrid Form Only)

actions.description: The deep scion emits a terrible scream audible within 300 feet. Creatures within 30 feet of the deep scion must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of the deep scion's next turn. In water, the psychic screech also telepathically transmits the deep scion's memories of the last 24 hours to its master, regardless of distance, so long as it and its master are in the same body of water.
actions.name: Psychic Screech (Hybrid Form Only; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

specialTraits.description: The deep scion can breathe air and water.
specialTraits.name: Amphibious (Hybrid Form Only)
